SELECT a.id AS enterprise_report_id, a.service_provider_id, b.service_provider_name, ( SELECT COUNT(c.id) FROM diyi_enterprise_report c WHERE c.service_provider_id = a.service_provider_id ) AS apply_count FROM diyi_enterprise_report a INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider b ON a.service_provider_id = b.id WHERE a.report_theme = #{param2}
AND b.service_provider_name LIKE concat('%', #{param1}, '%')
AND DATEDIFF(a.create_time, #{param3}) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(a.create_time, #{param4}) <= 0
GROUP BY a.service_provider_id

SELECT id,service_provider_id,main_body_type,main_body_id,report_theme,report_year,report_quater,report_month,report_dead_date,report_complete_date,report_result_desc,report_result_files,report_person,report_state,report_guard_name, IF ( b.main_body_type = 'INDIVIDUALENTERPRISE', ( SELECT a.ibname FROM diyi_individual_enterprise a WHERE a.id = b.main_body_id ), ( SELECT c.ibname FROM diyi_individual_business c WHERE c.id = b.main_body_id )) AS main_body_name FROM diyi_enterprise_report b WHERE b.main_body_type = 'INDIVIDUALENTERPRISE' OR b.main_body_type = 'INDIVIDUALBUSINESS' and b.service_provider_id =#{param1} and b.report_theme = #{param2}
